field.name: sPostFX
field.desc: The name of the postfx to play

field.name: fMinDistance
field.desc: The minimum distance of the effect. Strength will be 1 at this dist and closer, and blend to 0 as it reaches maxDistance.

field.name: fMaxDistance
field.desc: The maximum distance of the effect. Strength will be 0 at this dist and further, and blend to 1 as it reaches minDistance.

field.name: fMaxAngleOfVisibility
field.desc: The effect will only play if the explosion happens within this yaw angle of the player. Pitch is ignored.
